attributes.action: All fireworks sold in shops to general public to be made silent ones by law
attributes.additional_details: It should be against the law for loud fireworks unless its a professional display
attributes.background: Humans and animals suffer due to them and can lead to the death of people and animals alike from such things as ptsd, heart attacks and stress related issues

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
